main module¶

Main source file for DART Viewer application

Bases: fbs_runtime.application_context.PyQt5.ApplicationContext

This class sets up Application context for fman build

property main_window¶

Property method to render the main window

run()[source]¶

You should overwrite this method with the steps for starting your app. See eg. fbs’s tutorial.

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow, ui.main_window.Ui_MainWindow

get_dataset_subset()[source]¶

Displays the subset dialog, takes user input, and returns the new dataset subset

Parameters

dataset (xr.Dataset) – the original dataset

Returns

the new dataset after subsetting

Return type

xr.Dataset

master_plot()[source]¶

Generate all the necessary plots for a single netCDF file

open_file_dialog()[source]¶

Open a dialog for user to chose their dataset

setup_slots()[source]¶

This function connects pre-existing signals with the correct slots

setup_subset_dialog_ui()[source]¶

This function pre-fills the min and max values for time, lat and lon input fields

setup_validators()[source]¶

This function adds value validator for user input field. Users cannot input unspecified values.

For example, the Regex “[0-9]+” specifies a positive integer. The field will not let users input any other values.

show_dataset_info()[source]¶

Display the general information about the dataset and list all the variables on the GUI

show_parent_groups()[source]¶

Display all the groups that an observation is in based on user’s input of observation index
